title: Textile, 1920s
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: jacquard woven.  Combination of 5 & 1 satin, 1 & 6 satin, 1 & 2 twill, and plain weave with other structure at edges of motifs.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 54 x 63.5 cm (21 1/4 x 25 in.)
description: Clump of tropical plants - palm, ferns, and large leaves. Design is a half drop.
